user_query: I'm an app developer and I need to fetch the current Nav of mutual funds for my finance app. Can you provide me with the current Nav of a few popular mutual funds? Additionally, I would like to get the OHLC history for the EUR/USD currency pair to analyze the forex market.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current Net Asset Value (Nav) of selected popular mutual funds.
Retrieve the Open, High, Low, Close (OHLC) history for the EUR/USD currency pair.
